author: RT en Espa√±ol
title: Una fuerte tormenta convierte en r√≠os las calles de la capital de Bolivia (VIDEOS) - RT
text:
Una fuerte tormenta convierte en r√≠os las calles de la capital de Bolivia (VIDEOS) Publicado: 21 mar 2024 23:27 GMT Las fuertes lluvias ca√≠das en La Paz provocaron el desbordamiento de r√≠os, inundando calles y arrastrando autom√≥viles. Una fuerte tormenta golpe√≥ este mi√©rcoles la capital de Bolivia, La Paz, dejando las calles inundadas y parte de la infraestructura de la ciudad da√±ada. Las lluvias provocaron el desbordamiento de los r√≠os, creando en las calles r√°pidos torrentes de agua que arrastraron los coches .
Una torrencial lluvia ocasiona la inundaci√≥n de calles y avenidas, adem√°s el desborde de r√≠os en La Paz, Bolivia (20.03.24)üáßüá¥üåßÔ∏è pic.twitter.com/TwKgI2oJCO
‚Äî Impacto Natural (@ImpactoNatural) March 20, 2024 Los m√°s afectados por la lluvia y el granizo fueron los barrios del sur de La Paz, en particular Calacoto, Achumani, Aranjuez, Cota Cota y Amor de Dios. El desbordamiento de los r√≠os Achumani y Huay√±ajahuira , que tuvo la forma de ondas pulsantes, arrastr√≥ varios autom√≥viles que circulaban por la zona. Adem√°s, un obrero y una ni√±a fueron llevados por la riada de agua , pero los rescataron y sus vidas no corren peligro.
#HOY Lluvias y granizo afecta a La Paz as√≠ qued√≥ el puente de la Calle 8, Costanera y entrada a La Florida. pic.twitter.com/PocICgiZJo
‚Äî XTOTV Enlace Bolivia (@XTOTVenlace) March 20, 2024 Im√°genes de las Calles anegadas y r√≠os desbordados debido a la fuerte lluvia en la zona Sur de La Paz. pic.twitter.com/iGHQEPXyPm
‚Äî Br√∫jula Digital (@BrujulaNoticias) March 20, 2024 "En menos de 15-20 minutos ha ca√≠do una tormenta acompa√±ada de granizo en la zona sur, y eso ha provocado que los r√≠os crezcan de repente", explic√≥ lo ocurrido el alcalde de la capital, Iv√°n Arias. El funcionario pidi√≥ a la poblaci√≥n que se tomara m√°s en serio las advertencias de las autoridades y observara las medidas de precauci√≥n. "Le pido a la gente, por favor: si cortamos el tr√°fico, es porque est√° lloviendo, no es por molestar. Es para evitar que este desastre pase. La gente protesta, se enoja", sostuvo Arias.
Una tormenta con lluvias y granizo colaps√≥ los principales r√≠os en la ciudad de La Paz. Hay desbordes del r√≠o Choqueyapu, Achumani y Huaynajahuira con gran cantidad de calles y avenidas anegadas. pic.twitter.com/hveFPiQUIn
‚Äî Asuntos Centrales (@AsuntoCentral) March 20, 2024 Los servicios municipales est√°n ahora enfrentando las consecuencias de la tormenta, arreglando la vialidad da√±ada y limpiando las calles del barro que trajeron las corrientes de agua. Las autoridades de La Paz a√∫n est√°n evaluando los da√±os a la infraestructura de la ciudad.
Alcald√≠a logra habilitar el paso vehicular por la avenida #Arequipa y avenida #Costanera . Los trabajos de limpieza contin√∫an en la zona #Sur . pic.twitter.com/TimPzNcSxe
‚Äî Gobierno Aut√≥nomo Municipal de La Paz (@LaPazAlcaldia) March 20, 2024
Bolivia Inundaciones america_latina

author: Get News
title: A Better Solution In Home Care Reaffirms Its Commitment to Veterans with Specialized Home Care in Wichita, KS | User | mammothtimes.com
text:
A Better Solution In Home Care in Wichita, KS, proudly supports veterans with specialized home care services. Committed to honoring veterans' sacrifices, they offer personalized care focusing on independence and well-being. Their veteran-centric approach ensures quality senior care, reflecting their dedication to those who served. For more info, Google it at https://abshomecarewichita.com Wichita, KS - A Better Solution In Home Care, a premier provider of in-home care services, today announced its ongoing dedication to supporting veterans in Wichita, KS, by offering specialized home care tailored to their unique needs. Understanding the importance of veterans' affairs, A Better Solution is committed to providing quality senior care in Wichita, KS, highlighting its pledge to honor the service and sacrifice of veterans through exceptional care and support.
"Giving back to those who have served our country is not just a commitment but a privilege," stated Gustavo Torres, owner of A Better Solution In Home Care. "We recognize the unique challenges veterans face as they age and are dedicated to offering the specialized care they require. Our focus on veterans' affairs underscores our mission to deliver quality senior care in Wichita, KS, ensuring our veterans receive the respect, dignity, and quality of life they deserve."
A Better Solution In Home Care's veteran-centric approach to home care addresses the growing need for personalized, compassionate services that cater specifically to the veteran community. The agency's comprehensive suite of services, including personal care, mobility assistance, medication management, and companionship, is designed to meet the diverse needs of veterans, promoting independence and enhancing their overall well-being.
As one of the leading home care providers in Wichita, KS, for veterans, A Better Solution is unwavering in its commitment to excellence. By continuously striving to improve and adapt its services, the agency ensures that veterans in Wichita, KS, have access to the highest quality of care, reflecting the agency's dedication to those who have served.
For more information about A Better Solution In Home Care and their home care in Wichita, KS , please visit their website at https://abshomecarewichita.com
About A Better Solution In Home Care:
A Better Solution In Home Care specializes in providing seniors with high-quality, personalized home care services, focusing on veterans. Based in Wichita, KS, the agency is renowned for its commitment to excellence, compassion, and respect in all aspects of its service. Recognizing the importance of veterans' affairs, A Better Solution is proud to offer specialized care designed to meet the unique needs of veterans, ensuring they receive the best possible support and care in their later years.

author: ansa.it
title: Addio a X, i ricercatori migrano in massa su Bluesky - Ricerca e Istituzioni - Ansa.it
text:
Dal social X (ex Twitter) verso Bluesky : ha preso il via una vera e propria migrazione di massa di scienziati verso il nuovo social passato da 14 a 21 milioni di utenti in 2 settimane . Un fenomeno iniziato in particolare dopo il risultato delle elezioni americane e che, come ha documentato anche la rivista Nature sul suo sito , nasce dall'esigenza dei ricercatori di trovare un ambiente social pi√π sereno, lontano da spam, bot, disinformazione e linguaggi violenti.
Per anni Twitter era stato il social pi√π amato dal mondo della ricerca . Il social con il simbolo dell'uccellino godeva infatti del vantaggio di basarsi su contenuti brevi, essere molto rapido e aggiornato sui fatti di cronaca e, infine, era l'unica piattaforma social che permettesse ai ricercatori l'accesso ai dati per scopi di ricerca. Le cose sono cambiate con il passaggio di Twitter a Elon Musk, che oltre a dare un nuovo nome al social ha modificato i meccanismi di moderazione. Questo, secondo molti, ha portato all'esplosione di bot e al dilagare di disinformazione e linguaggi violenti.
Proprio per intercettare questo scontento erano nati nuovi social come Mastodon e Threads, ma una vera e propria migrazione si sta registrando ora con Bluesky , un social che ricalca moltissimo il vecchio Twitter anche nei colori e nella grafica . Punti di forza di Bluesky, sottolinea Nature, sono anche gli strumenti per costruire le nuove reti , tra cui gli ' starting pack ' ossia blocchi di contatti su specifici temi sviluppati dagli utenti, e un meccanismo efficace di filtraggio dei contenuti indesiderati e per la moderazione dei contenuti.

author: @Augustana_IL
title: Augustana selects Dr. Erin Kempker to lead new Center for Engaged Learning, Teaching, and Scholarship | Augustana College
text:
Augustana selects Dr. Erin Kempker to lead new Center for Engaged Learning, Teaching, and Scholarship
Augustana announces the selection of Dr. Erin Kempker to lead the newly launched Center for Engaged Learning, Teaching, and Scholarship. She will start at the college Feb. 3.
‚ÄúDr. Kempker is known for her extraordinary ability to bring people together to solve challenges, ignite new ideas, and amplify the unique strengths within a community. Her visionary leadership will be instrumental in driving forward our Bold & Boundless strategic plan, and we are excited for the future she will help shape at Augustana."
Augustana‚Äôs Center for Engaged Learning, Teaching, and Scholarship (CELTS), will support professional development for all educators on campus, both faculty and staff. The center supersedes the college‚Äôs Center for Faculty Enrichment, which will phase out this spring.
Provost Dr. Dianna Shandy said Dr. Kempker is an accomplished scholar, inspiring teacher, and proven leader.
‚ÄúDr. Kempker is known for her extraordinary ability to bring people together to solve challenges, ignite new ideas, and amplify the unique strengths within a community,‚Äù Dr. Shandy said. ‚ÄúHer visionary leadership will be instrumental in driving forward our [Bold & Boundless](https://www.augustana.edu/about-us/president/strategicplan) strategic plan, and we are excited for the future she will help shape at Augustana.‚Äù
Dr. Kempker comes to Augustana from Mississippi University for Women in Columbus, Miss., where she worked her way up from assistant professor to full professor. She also served as department chair of history, political science, and geography for six years. She most recently served as interim director of the quality enhancement plan, a required component of the university‚Äôs accreditation reaffirmation process through Southern Association of Colleges and Schools Commission on Colleges that focused on student success, high-impact learning, and career readiness. She has a history of securing grants to support institutional initiatives.
She earned her doctorate and master‚Äôs in history at Purdue University and a bachelor‚Äôs in social studies and secondary education at the University of Central Missouri.
Dr. Kempker said it is a privilege to join the faculty and staff in the work of launching CELTS to help build even more capacity for active, community-based learning in the semesters and years to come.
‚ÄúDuring the interview process, it was clear that faculty and staff at Augustana are student-centered and committed to creating a transformational learning experience for every student,‚Äù she said. ‚ÄúHelping this college, this faculty and staff do that as well as possible is a dream job for me.‚Äù
CELTS is aimed at advancing a culture of learner-centered, critically reflective teaching grounded in equity and evidence. Dr. Kempker will support faculty growth through workshops, seminars, coaching and leading new faculty orientation.
Her work will also include encouraging faculty scholarship, interdisciplinary collaborations and partnering with faculty and [CORE](https://www.augustana.edu/academics/core) (Careers, Opportunity, Research, Exploration) ‚Äî the college‚Äôs center for preparing students for meaningful post-graduate work, service and education ‚Äî to facilitate experiential and active learning, including the development of community-based learning and partnerships.
Contact:
Nicole Lauer, 309-794-7645 or [nicolelauer@augustana.edu](mailto:nicolelauer@augustana.edu)

author: Maria Tril
title: Zelenskyy awards Medal of Honor to defenders in Avdiivka
text:
Ukraine‚Äôs President Volodymyr Zelenskyy visited the 110th separate mechanized brigade named after General-Colonel Marko Bezruchko, located in Avdiivka, Donetsk Oblast, the Presidential Office
reported on 29 December.
After Russia‚Äôs renewed assault on Avdiivka in October 2023, the Donetsk Oblast town of Avdiivka has seen the most intense fighting. According to the
British Defense Ministry intel, Russian military casualties over the last six weeks ‚Äúhave likely seen some of the highest Russian casualty rates of the war so far.‚Äù
During his visit, Zelenskyy also awarded Ukrainian servicemen. In particular, he presented the title of Hero of Ukraine to Junior Sergeant Ihor Tymoshchuk.
The brigade commander, Mykola Chumak, said that ‚Äúthe Russian invaders do not spare people, but Ukrainian defenders firmly hold their positions and even take enemy soldiers prisoner.‚Äù
‚ÄúToday in Avdiivka, together with the team, we extended Christmas and New Year greetings to the military. All those who are on the front line. We remember what is at stake in this war. We are defending our country,‚Äù Zelesnkyy said.
Read also:
‚ÄúWe cannot use our people as meat, as the Russians do,‚Äù Zelenskyy says, explaining the need for air defense Zelenskyy meets with leaders of US defense companies ISW: Russia will continue missile strikes against Ukraine Russian unprecedented air attack kills 30, injures over 160, hits maternity ward, mall (updated)

author: Hussam
title: üöÄüåü Lessons Learned from Our First Launch on Product Hunt üåüüöÄ | Product Hunt
text: üöÄüåü Lessons Learned from Our First Launch on Product Hunt üåüüöÄ [Hussam](https://www.producthunt.com/@hussam_gpt) 11 replies Hello amazing Product Hunt community, After our exciting journey with the first launch of "Jaeves", we would like to share some valuable lessons we learned. This experience was not only important for the growth of our product, but it was also a learning journey filled with inspiration and challenges. 1Ô∏è‚É£ Advance Planning and Preparation: We realized the importance of advance preparation and good planning for the launch. This includes everything from market research to preparing eye-catching marketing materials. 2Ô∏è‚É£ Community Engagement: We actively communicated with Product Hunt users and listened to their feedback. This kind of interaction is invaluable and helps to continuously improve the product. 3Ô∏è‚É£ The Importance of Responding to Feedback: Quickly and constructively responding to comments and questions was essential in building trust with our community. 4Ô∏è‚É£ Learning from Obstacles: We faced some challenges, but each challenge was an opportunity to learn and grow. We believe that stumbling is an integral part of the journey to success. 5Ô∏è‚É£ Continuous Innovation: Continuous development of our product and listening to user needs helped us in innovating and improving constantly. Thank you for your great support and valuable comments. The beauty of the Product Hunt journey lies in collaboration and growing together as a community. We look forward to sharing more of our achievements with you in the future! [https://www.producthunt.com/post...](https://www.producthunt.com/posts/jaevesai-creative-suite-2-0-beta) Replies Hey there! I'm really impressed with the lessons you've shared from your first launch on Product Hunt. Your experience with "Jaeves" is truly inspiring and valuable for someone like me who's about to launch their own product. Do you have any advice for a first-time launcher like me? I'd love to hear your thoughts on how to prepare and engage with the community effectively. Also, when my product is live, I'd really appreciate your feedback. Feel free to click on the "Notify" button to get notified when it's ready. Thanks in advance for your support! Congratulations on the successful launch of "Jaeves" on Product Hunt! It's great to hear about the valuable lessons you've learned from this experience. Your insights are not only helpful for your own product's growth but also for the entire Product Hunt community. I completely agree with your points, especially the emphasis on advance planning and preparation. It's crucial to lay a strong foundation for a successful launch. Engaging with the community and responding to feedback shows your dedication to improving the product based on user needs, which is commendable. Embracing obstacles as opportunities for growth is a fantastic mindset to have. It's through challenges that we often discover our greatest strengths and innovations. Your commitment to continuous improvement and innovation is truly inspiring. Thank you for sharing your journey and insights with us. I'm looking forward to seeing more of your achievements in the future. Keep up the fantastic work! Lessons from our debut on Product Hunt: Timing is crucial, engage the community early, and prioritize user interaction for invaluable feedback‚Äîeach launch is a launchpad for improvement. üöÄüåü

author: Lisandra Borges P√©rez
title: Reanudar√°n este viernes actividades docentes en Villa Clara
text:
A partir del restablecimiento del Sistema Electroenerg√©tico Nacional, este 6 de diciembre se reanudar√°n las actividades docentes en todas las escuelas de Villa Clara excepto en los centros internos, los que recibir√°n a los estudiantes a partir del domingo, as√≠ lo inform√≥ la MSc. Yamil√© Herrera Alfonso, directora general de Educaci√≥n en el territorio, durante la reuni√≥n de coordinaci√≥n presidida por las m√°ximas autoridades de la provincia.
Adem√°s, precis√≥ que ma√±ana los educandos consolidar√°n junto a sus profesores los contenidos que se evaluar√°n la pr√≥xima semana a trav√©s de los ex√°menes de control parciales.
En la reuni√≥n tambi√©n se habl√≥ sobre la situaci√≥n con el abasto de agua en la provincia y en Santa Clara. Respecto al comportamiento de la distribuci√≥n del preciado l√≠quido en la ciudad de Marta y el Che, Adri√°n Morales Garc√≠a, director de Acueducto y Alcantarillado Municipal, explic√≥ que despu√©s del restablecimiento del servicio el√©ctrico se decidi√≥ arrancar el bombeo sobre las 6 de la ma√±ana.
En estos momentos se est√° bombeando agua para los hospitales de la cabecera provincial y con el sistema Palmarito se est√° distribuyendo para el Hospital Celestino Hern√°ndez y el Cardiocentro. Asimismo, detall√≥ que el Sistema Minerva-Ochoita estar√° trabajando de forma estable. Se intentar√° mantener el servicio en el Reparto Moro-Vocacional, el Gigante y dem√°s barrios asociados.
El director de Acueducto y Alcantarillado Municipal destac√≥ que ma√±ana 6 de diciembre se detendr√° el sistema Minerva-Ochoita debido a las acciones inversionistas que se est√°n llevando a cabo en el lugar, como resultado de la llegada de nuevos equipos de bombeo. All√≠ laborar√°n brigadas de la Empresa CEDAI y la Empresa de Construcci√≥n y Montaje en la instalaci√≥n de los paneles solares, as√≠ como los propios trabajadores de Acueducto y Alcantarillado, quienes aportar√°n en las acciones de limpieza en la estaci√≥n.
Analizan temas vitales para el territorio tras el restablecimiento del Sistema El√©ctrico Nacional (SEN).
